transcript: What I can do for you, if you want to make a call right now, I can contact you through a computer, I can call through my phone, and you can speak through me.

segments.text: What I can do for you, if you want to make a call right now, I can contact you through
a computer, I can call through my phone, and you can speak through me.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: What I can do for you, if you want to make a call right now I could contact you through our computer.  I can call through my phone and you can speak through me.
